title: mbquartR
text: function takes coordinates locates nearest centre quarter section based euclidean distance two points. Given quarter sections half mile square (804.7m 804.7m) furthest distance center corner ~570m. get warning distances greater 600m error distance greater 1000m. tibble returned provides legal land descriptions, centre coordinates, distance coordinates provided closest quarter section centre.

title: mbquartR
text: function takes legal land descriptions locates centre coordinates quarter sections. can include leading zeroes (e.g., NE-01-012-12E1) (e.g., NE-1-12-12E1). data set used package includes three meridians (W1, E1, E2); however, commonly searched quarter sections use East 1 (E1) West 1 (W1) meridians. meridian number included default 1. example, search NW-36-89-11E default search NW-36-89-11E1 despite NW-36-89-11E2 existing data set.
